summary: Provides a utility class that encapsulates helper methods for handling single items and collections related to database picking operations in MAPDL. It enables generation and augmentation of DATABASE commands that are normally produced by the GUI when users perform picking actions, allowing additional parameters such as extra spline points to be added programmatically.
business_intent: To streamline and automate the creation and modification of MAPDL DATABASE commands associated with user picking actions, supporting custom extensions and integration within scripts or applications.
